projects: [{"title":"Handwriting Recognition","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"•Trained and Tested Handwritten Digits on Google Colab using dataset provided by MNIST•Created and trained a model based on Convolutional Neural Network(CNN) which is imported from Tensorflow library.•Created Visualizations and Intrepretation using NumPy, Pandas and Matplotlib libraries.•The MNIST Dataset is imported form Keras Datasets and performed the Neural Network with Rectified Linear Unit(ReLU) as an activation function."}]
